none:
Originally ripped by Terminal Escape, posted on June 16, 2014 Description from Terminal Escape:
Blown out punk as fukk madness from the Gainesville MAUSER tree. You know what you're getting here, and you are about to get a motherfukkn facefull - searing guitars, a beyond bombastic rhythm section and vocals shouting out a constant struggle to be heard through the white hissssssss. Your ears can only take so much when digested at proper volume, and ECTOPLASM has cut their initial offering mercifully short at four songs. You're welcome. EAST COAST TOUR 2013
//2.bp.blogspot.com/-K7efv7cqEIA/U558LRj2ybI/AAAAAAAAKLg/h27gIxTcXyY/s1600/ectoplasm+cover.jpg //1.bp.blogspot.com/-YG6-VpEV9Lg/U559BLs0jRI/AAAAAAAAKLo/72H0sxfeRII/s1600/ectoplasm+inside.jpg

seo.title: Ectoplasm - East Coast tour tape 2013 - Terminal Escape
